snippet: Companies are becoming more responsive to customers who demand to know more about everyday products like air fresheners and cleaning products.
abstract: SC Johnson discloses ingredients used in its Glade air freshening products on its website, responding to customers who want to know more about what is used in products they buy.
lead_paragraph: Companies are becoming more responsive to customers who demand to know more about everyday products like air fresheners and cleaning products.

headline.main: Smells Like Hawaii (and Benzyl Acetate): Revealing the Chemicals in Glade’s Fragrances
headline.print_headline: Maker of Glade to Disclose Chemical Details
